document_data.name: Duric Green
document_data.mainbody: '''Duric Green''' ({{Pronounce|DUR|ick|_|green|refs={{Cite adventurers league/The Map with No Names|4-5,12}}
document_data.Description: Duric was a sturdy man sporting an impressive beard under a balding head.
document_data.Personality:
His husband [[Zelphin Green|Zel]] and his business meant everything to Durin. Often jovial and smiling, he loved to hear entertaining stories from [[adventurer]]s. He was willing to offer a free [[:Category:Food and drink|meal and drinks]] to people entertaining him and his guests with tales of their daring deeds.

Duric had a positive outlook on life, and was always ready to offer words of encouragements to guests. He was, however, terrible at keeping secrets.
